item.description: Let's get together again & give the dogs a chance to run & play off leash ( in a fenced in location)! Since this went over really well last time Matt & I figured we'd try another playdate again this month! Hope for some good weather so our furry friends can run & play! :o)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be there w/ the Inu's :o)
item.why: It would be nice to give the dogs a chance to play off leash again

group.name: Shiba Inu Meet Up of Eastern MA & Southern NH

item.name: Playtime @ Bark Place
